header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle1: Find answers to the most common questions about Inscrix.
header.subtitle2: If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact us.

contact.title: Didn't find the answer?
contact.subtitle: Our support team is always available to help.

general.a1: Inscrix is a complete platform for managing sports and cultural events. We offer integrated solutions for registrations, payments, timing, and participant management, all in one easy-to-use platform.
general.q2: What types of events can I create?
general.a2: You can create any type of event: races, cycling, swimming, triathlon, marathons, walks, cultural festivals, shows, workshops, conferences, and much more. Our platform is flexible and adapts to any modality.
general.q3: Do I need technical knowledge to use Inscrix?
general.a3: No! Inscrix was designed to be intuitive and easy to use. Anyone can create and manage professional events without the need for technical knowledge. Furthermore, we offer full support and tutorials.
general.q4: Is the platform available in Portuguese?
general.a4: Yes, Inscrix is fully translated into Portuguese and adapted to the Portuguese market, including local payment methods and specific regulations.

registrations.q1: How does the registration process work?
registrations.a1: Participants access the event page, choose the ticket type, fill in their details, and proceed to payment. They automatically receive a confirmation email with all the registration details.
registrations.q2: Can I customize the registration form?
registrations.a2: Yes, you can add custom fields according to your event's needs: t-shirt size, dietary restrictions, emergency contact, medical information, among others.
registrations.q3: How do I manage registrations after the event is published?
registrations.a3: Through the organizer panel, you can view all registrations in real-time, export participant lists, communicate with registrants, and manage pending payments.
registrations.q4: Can I set limits on participants?
registrations.a4: Yes, you can set a maximum number of participants overall or by category/ticket type. Registrations automatically stop when the limit is reached.

payments.a1: We offer multiple options: credit/debit card, bank transfer, MB WAY, Paypal, and other local methods. All payments are processed with maximum security.
payments.q2: When do I receive the money from registrations?
payments.a2: Payments are transferred to your account within 2-5 business days after payment confirmation by the participant, deducting only a small processing fee.
payments.q3: Can I offer discounts and vouchers?
payments.a3: Yes, you can create discount codes, early bird prices, quantity discounts, and personalized vouchers with different rules and limitations.
payments.a4: You can define personalized refund policies for each event. Refunds are processed automatically through the same original payment method.

timing.a1: We use state-of-the-art RFID chips that are automatically activated when the participant passes the timing points. Results are calculated and published in real-time.
timing.q2: Can I have multiple timing points?
timing.a2: Yes, you can define as many timing points as you need: start, finish, and intermediate points. This is especially useful for long events or those with multiple modalities.
timing.a3: Yes, our timing system complies with all international standards, and the results can be officially certified for federated competitions.
timing.q4: Can I see the results in real-time?
timing.a4: Yes, the results appear on our website in real-time. Participants and spectators can follow the progress during the event.

security.a1: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption (SSL 256-bit) and strictly comply with GDPR. Participant data is protected with the highest security standards.
security.q2: How do you protect participant data?
security.a2: All personal data is encrypted and stored on secure servers in Europe. You only have access to the necessary data to manage your event and can delete it whenever you wish.
security.q3: What measures do you take against fraud?
security.a3: We implement advanced fraud detection systems, automatic payment verification, and continuous monitoring of suspicious activities.

support.q1: What kind of support do you offer?
support.a1: We offer full support via email, chat, and phone. Our team is available to help from the event creation until the end of the competition.
support.q2: Do you have tutorials or training?
support.a2: Yes, we have a complete library of video tutorials, written guides, and offer personalized training sessions for organizers managing large events.
support.q3: What if I have problems on the day of the event?
support.a3: We have a dedicated support line for the day of the event, with specialized technicians ready to resolve any situation that may arise.
support.q4: Can I migrate events from other platforms?
support.a4: Yes, our team can help you migrate events and data from other platforms free of charge and without service interruption.
